bandhome.forms module

class bandhome.forms.SignUpForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: UserCreationForm

sign-up form that requests firstname, surname, email, username, password and password confirmation.

Parameters:

  • first_name (str, required) – A new user’s first name. This is a string with maximum length of 30 characters, defaults to None

  • last_name (str, required) – A new user’s surname. This is a string with maximum length of 40 characters, defaults to None

  • email (Emailfield, optional) – A new user’s email address. This is a string with no length restriction, defaults to None

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

Metaclass for SignupForm

fields = ('first_name', 'last_name', 'email', 'username', 'password1', 'password2')
